abstract: A view on a column that replaces missing elements with a default value.

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/TabularData/FilledColumn

# FilledColumn

**Structure**

A view on a column that replaces missing elements with a default value.

## Declaration

```swift
struct FilledColumn<Base> where Base : OptionalColumnProtocol
```

## Inspecting a Column

- **name**: The name of the column.

## Finding an Element Index

- **argmin()**: Returns the index of the element with the lowest value.
- **argmax()**: Returns the index of the element with the highest value.

## Accessing Elements

- **subscript(_:)**: Retrieves an element at a position in the column type.

## Summarizing a Column

- **summary()**: Generates a categorical summary of the filled column’s elements, including default values.
- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the integer column’s elements.
- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column’s elements.

## Getting Statistical Values

- **sum()**: Returns the sum of the integer column’s elements.
- **sum()**: Returns the sum of the floating-point column’s elements.
- **min()**: Returns the element with the lowest value.
- **max()**: Returns the element with the highest value.
- **mean()**: Returns the mean average of the integer column’s elements.
- **mean()**: Returns the mean average of the floating-point column’s elements.
- **standardDeviation(deltaDegreesOfFreedom:)**: Returns the standard deviation of the integer column’s elements.
- **standardDeviation(deltaDegreesOfFreedom:)**: Returns the standard deviation of the floating-point column’s elements.

## Describing a Column

- **description**: A mirror that reflects the filled column.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the filled column suitable for debugging.
- **description(options:)**: Generates a string description of the filled column.

## Supporting Types

- **FilledColumn.Element**: The type of the column’s elements that defines an associated type for the bidirectional collection protocol.
- **FilledColumn.WrappedElement**: The type of the column’s elements that defines an associated type for the optional column protocol.

## Default Implementations

- **CustomStringConvertible Implementations**

## Typed Columns

- **Column**: A column in a data frame.
- **ColumnSlice**: A collection that represents a selection of contiguous elements from a typed column.
- **DiscontiguousColumnSlice**: A collection that represents a selection, potentially with gaps, of elements from a typed column.
- **ColumnProtocol**: A type that represents a column.
- **OptionalColumnProtocol**: A type that represents a column that has missing values.

## Conforms To

- BidirectionalCollection
- Collection
- ColumnProtocol
- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- Sequence
